about.body:
Thank you all for another wonderful Feast of the Seven Fishes this year!

We are now resting and enjoying time with our loved ones for our holiday closure.

There is lots in store at Caf√© Mars in 2025, so follow along here and on IG: **[@cafemarsbk](https://www.instagram.com/cafemarsbk/?hl=en "@cafemarsbk")**!
